titleStmt.title: A proper newe ballad sheweing that philosophers learnynges, are full of good warnynges. And songe to the tune of My Lorde Marques Galyarde: or The firste traces of que passa.
titleStmt.author: Elderton, William, d. 1592?

publicationStmt.publisher: in fleetestreet beneath the conduit, at the signe of Sainte. Iohn Euangelist, by Thomas Colwell,

notesStmt.note: Date of publication suggested by STC.
Verse: "Philosophers learnings, are ful of good warnigs [sic] ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.

place.placeName: fleetestreet beneath the conduit, at the signe of Sainte. Iohn Euangelist
